message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable product that I believe will be of great benefit to you.  While it's worth significantly more to me, I'm willing to offer it to you at a price that reflects its value to you. I'm proposing a price of $1,200,000.  This gives you a substantial savings and allows you to secure this product without having to pay the full market value.  Let me know your thoughts.
